<li class="parentMenuItem menuBtn menu_item sm-invisible">
<a class="white dBlock linkBtn  icon-wrapper pr" href="/predictions/"><span class="sm-invisible">Predictions</span></a>
</li>

data-mobify-page="2">Last 5</th><th data-modal-position="top" class="w05 ppg bold hover-modal-parent" data-mobify-page="2">PPG<div class="hover-modal-content" data-modal-call="PPG" data-modal-html="<div class='mid-small ac lh14e'><span class='bold'>Points Per Game (PPG)</span><br/>Average points picked up per match across the competition.<br/>Higher numbers indicate a stronger team.<br/>Max. <div class='form-box excellent'>3.00</div> Points</div>"></div></th><th data-sort="int" data-modal-position="top" class="w045 cs bold sort hover-modal-parent" data-mobify-page="2">CS<div class="hover-modal-content" data-modal-call="CS"><div class="mid-small ac lh14e"><span class="bold">Clean Sheets (CS)</span>.<br>Table of teams with the highest number of matches where they conceded 0 goals. Stats are taken from League runs only.<br><span class="dark-gray lh14e small">* Team must have played a minimum of 7 matches before they qualify for this CS table.</span></div></div></th><th data-sort="int" data-modal-position="top" class="w045 btts bold sort hover-modal-parent" data-mobify-page="2">BTTS<div class="hover-modal-content" data-modal-call="BTTS"><div class="mid-small ac lh14e"><span class="bold">Both Teams To Score (BTTS)</span>.<br>List of teams with the highest number of matches where both teams scored. Stats from team's Domestic League runs only.<br><span class="dark-gray lh14e small">* Team must have played a minimum of 7 matches before they qualify for this BTTS table.</span></div></div></th><th data-sort="float" data-modal-position="top" class="w045 fts bold sort hover-modal-parent" data-mobify-page="3">xGF<div class="hover-modal-content"><div class="mid-small ac lh14e"><span class="bold">Expected Goals For</span></div></div></th><th data-sort="float" data-modal-position="top" class="w045 over05 sort bold hover-modal-parent" data-mobify-page="3"><div class="yellow-card-div class="w045 over15 sort bold hover-modal-parent" data-mobify-page="3">1.5+<div class="hover-modal-content" data-modal-call="Over15"><div class="mid-small ac lh14e"><span class="bold">Over 1.5 (1.5+)</span>.<br>The number or percent of matches where the total goals ended above 1.5 (ie: 2, 3, or 4 goals)</div></div></th><th data-sort="int" data-modal-position="top" class="w045 over25 sort style="width:18px;" src="https://cdn.footystats.org/img/teams/spain-fc-barcelona_thumb.png" class="club-image-border-circular club-image-size-tiny mr05 fa-adjust-l3" alt=""><span class="fa-adjust-h1">FC Barcelona&nbsp;-&nbsp;26</span></span></a></div><div class="w100 mb10 pr cf" style="background:rgba(220,220,220,.2);"><a style="width:58%;" class="fl goal-row home dark-gray bbox pl05 semi-bold" href="/clubs/real-sociedad-de-futbol-290">2.<span class="pa" style="margin-left:2px;"><img style="width:18px;" src="https://cdn.footystats.org/img/teams/spain-real-sociedad-de-futbol_thumb.png" class="club-image-border-circular club-image-size-tiny mr05 fa-adjust-l3" alt=""><span class="fa-adjust-h1">Real Sociedad&nbsp;-&nbsp;15</span></span></a></div><div class="w100 mb10 pr cf" style="background:rgba(220,220,220,.2);"><a style="width:50%;" class="fl goal-row home dark-gray bbox pl05 semi-bold" href="/clubs/real-madrid-cf-84">3.<span class="pa" style="margin-left:2px;"><img style="width:18px;" src="https://cdn.footystats.org/img/teams/spain-real-madrid-cf_thumb.png" class="club-image-border-circular club-image-size-tiny mr05 fa-adjust-l3" alt=""><span class="fa-adjust-h1">Real Madrid&nbsp;-&nbsp;13</span></span></a></div><div class="w100 mb10 pr cf" fa-adjust-l3" alt=""><span class="fa-adjust-h1">Atltico Madrid&nbsp;-&nbsp;13</span></span></a></div><div class="w100 mb10 pr cf" style="background:rgba(220,220,220,.2);"><a style="width:50%;" Mallorca&nbsp;-&nbsp;13</span></span></a></div><p class="small-fu semi-bold gray mt1e">* La Liga Club Stats from 2022/23 season</p></div></section>				</div>

			</div>

		</div>
</div>



<div class="section cf">
	<div class="normalContentWidth cf">


		

		<div class="widget mt2e">
			<h2 class="header al pl05e">More Info on Spain La Liga</h2>
			<div class="widget-content al">
				<h3 class="lh11e fs12e mt05e">What is Spain La Liga?</h3>
				<p class="lh14e mt05e">La Liga is a football domestic league competition held annually in Spain. The current La Liga season is 2022/23. La Liga is the 1st division in Spain. This means that the league is 1st in the domestic pyramid. 380 matches are currently scheduled in total, and so far 380 fixtures have been completed with 955 goals have been scored in aggregate. 20 teams are competing for the title this season.</p>

				<h3 class="lh11e fs12e mt1e pt1e grayBorderTop">What are the recent Spain La Liga results?</h3>
				<p class="lh14e mt05e">The latest results in La Liga are : <a href="/spain/reial-club-deportiu-espanyol-vs-ud-almeria-h2h-stats#2711036">Reial Club Deportiu Espanyol vs UD Almera</a> (Ended 3 - 3), <a href="/spain/fc-barcelona-vs-real-club-celta-de-vigo-h2h-stats#2711033">Real Club Celta de Vigo vs FC Barcelona</a> (Ended 2 - 1), <a href="/spain/elche-cf-vs-cadiz-cf-h2h-stats#2711035">Elche CF vs Cdiz CF</a> (Ended 1 - 1). The last fixture was played on June 4, 2023. For the rest of the results of matches in this season, please visit our <a href="/spain/la-liga/fixtures">results and fixtures list</a>.</p>

				<h3 class="lh11e fs12e mt1e pt1e grayBorderTop">Which fixtures are upcoming in Spain La Liga?</h3>
				<p class="lh14e mt05e">There are no more upcoming fixtures. For all fixture results, go to <a href="/spain/la-liga/fixtures">La Liga fixtures and results list</a>.</p>

				<h3 class="lh11e fs12e mt1e pt1e grayBorderTop">Who is the table leader in Spain La Liga?</h3>
				<p class="lh14e mt05e">In the current 2022/23 season, <a class="bold" href="/clubs/fc-barcelona-83">FC Barcelona</a> is 1st in the La Liga table with 88 points from 38 matches played. This is from 28 wins, 4 draws, and 6 losses. FC Barcelona scored 70 goals and conceded 20 goals in the process. <a href="/clubs/fc-barcelona-83">Their average points per game is 2.32 across the entire 2022/23 season</a>.<br><br><a class="bold" href="/clubs/real-madrid-cf-84">Real Madrid CF</a> is 2nd in the La Liga table with 78 points earned. This puts them 10 points behind 1st place <a href="/clubs/fc-barcelona-83" class="bold">FC Barcelona</a> and 1 points in front of 3rd place <a class="bold" href="/clubs/club-atletico-de-madrid-117">Club Atltico de Madrid</a>.</p>

				<h3 class="lh11e fs12e mt1e pt1e grayBorderTop">What's the Match Attendance in Spain La Liga like?</h3>
				<p class="lh14e mt05e">An average of 30,209 people attend each fixture in Spain La Liga. For more attendance specific data, visit <a href="/spain/la-liga/attendance">La Liga Attendance list</a>.</p>

				<h3 class="lh11e fs12e mt1e pt1e grayBorderTop">Who are the Top Scorers in Spain La Liga?</h3>

				<p class="lh14e mt05e">La Liga players with the most goals in the 2022/23 are : <a class="bold" href="/players/poland/robert-lewandowski">Robert Lewandowski</a> (23 goals), <a class="bold" href="/players/france/karim-benzema">Karim Benzema</a> (19 goals), <a class="bold" href="/players/spain/joselu">Joselu</a> (16 goals), <a class="bold" href="/players/kosovo/vedat-muriqi">Vedat Muriqi</a> (15 goals), <a class="bold" href="/players/france/antoine-griezmann">Antoine Griezmann</a> (15 goals), <a class="bold" href="/players/spain/borja-iglesias">Borja Iglesias</a> (15 goals), <a class="bold" href="/players/turkey/enes-unal">Enes nal</a> (14 goals), <a class="bold" href="/players/argentina/valentin-castellanos">Valentn Castellanos</a> (13 goals), <a class="bold" href="/players/spain/alvaro-morata">Alvaro Morata</a> (13 goals), <a class="bold" href="/players/norway/alexander-sorloth">Alexander Srloth</a> (12 goals), and <a class="bold" href="/players/spain/iago-aspas">Iago Aspas</a> (12 goals).</p>
				<p class="lh14e mt05e">The teams that are scoring really well at the moment are : <a href="/clubs/real-madrid-cf-84">Real Madrid CF</a> with 75 goals scored (44 at home and 31 at away), <a href="/clubs/club-atletico-de-madrid-117">Club Atltico de Madrid</a> with 70 goals scored (41 at home and 29 at away), <a href="/clubs/fc-barcelona-83">FC Barcelona</a> with 70 goals scored (37 at home and 33 at away), and <a href="/clubs/villarreal-cf-76">Villarreal CF</a> with 59 goals scored (36 at home and 23 at away).</p>
				<p class="lh14e mt05e">At home venues, the teams that are the top of the scoring table are : <a href="/clubs/real-madrid-cf-84">Real Madrid CF</a> with 44 home goals, <a href="/clubs/club-atletico-de-madrid-117">Club Atltico de Madrid</a> with 41 home goals, <a href="/clubs/fc-barcelona-83">FC Barcelona</a> with 37 home goals, and <a href="/clubs/villarreal-cf-76">Villarreal CF</a> with 36 home goals.</p>
				<p class="lh14e mt05e">Away from home, the top scoring teams are : <a href="/clubs/real-madrid-cf-84">Real Madrid CF</a> with 31 away goals, <a href="/clubs/club-atletico-de-madrid-117">Club Atltico de Madrid</a> with 29 away goals, <a href="/clubs/fc-barcelona-83">FC Barcelona</a> with 33 away goals, and <a href="/clubs/villarreal-cf-76">Villarreal CF</a> with 23 away goals.</p>


				<h3 class="lh11e fs12e mt1e pt1e grayBorderTop">Who are the Top Defending Teams in Spain La Liga?</h3>

				<p class="lh14e mt05e">The teams that are defending well at the moment in the La Liga are : <a href="/clubs/reial-club-deportiu-espanyol-280">Reial Club Deportiu Espanyol</a> with 69 goals conceded (35 at home and 34 at away), <a href="/clubs/elche-cf-295">Elche CF</a> with 67 goals conceded (29 at home and 38 at away), <a href="/clubs/ud-almeria-296">UD Almera</a> with 65 goals conceded (22 at home and 43 at away), and <a href="/clubs/real-valladolid-club-de-futbol-297">Real Valladolid Club de Ftbol</a> with 63 goals conceded (25 at home and 38 at away).</p>
				<p class="lh14e mt05e">Teams that have kept the most clean sheets in the La Liga are : <a href="/clubs/fc-barcelona-83">FC Barcelona</a> with 26 clean sheets, <a href="/clubs/real-sociedad-de-futbol-290">Real Sociedad de Ftbol</a> with 15 clean sheets, <a href="/clubs/real-club-deportivo-mallorca-298">Real Club Deportivo Mallorca</a> with 13 clean sheets, and <a href="/clubs/club-atletico-de-madrid-117">Club Atltico de Madrid</a> with 13 clean sheets.</p>




			</div>
		</div>

	</div>

<script>
	var webview = false;
	var livescore = false;var livescore_h2h = false;</script>
<script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-2.2.4.min.js" integrity="sha256-BbhdlvQf/xTY9gja0Dq3HiwQF8LaCRTXxZKRutelT44=" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.footystats.org/js/global-min139.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.footystats.org/js/min/jstz.min.js"></script>
<script>
  $(document).ready(function() {
  	$('#contact-form-submit').on('click',function(e){
  		var original_text = $(this).text();
  		$(this).html("<p class='loadingAnim'><i style='font-size:14px !important;' class='far fa-futbol'></i> &nbsp;Sending... Takes a few moments...</p>");
  	});
  	function getCookie(name)
	{
	    var re = new RegExp(name + "=([^;]+)");
	    var value = re.exec(document.cookie);
	    return (value != null) ? unescape(value[1]) : null;
	}

  		// if user timezone is not set
  		var timezone_set = getCookie('tz');
  		if(timezone_set == "" || timezone_set == null){
		    $.ajax({
	            type: "POST",
	            url: "/ajax_pong.php",
	            data: 'timezone=' + jstz.determine().name(),
	            success: function(data){
	            	// instead of reloading page, change all of the current page's dates and then set the cookie?
	            	// Build the expiration date string:
					var expiration_date = new Date();
					var cookie_string = '';
					var timezone = jstz.determine().name();
					expiration_date.setFullYear(expiration_date.getFullYear() + 1);
					// Build the set-cookie string:
					cookie_string = "tz="+timezone+"; path=/; expires=" + expiration_date.toUTCString();
					// Create or update the cookie:
					document.cookie = cookie_string;
					// console.log(timezone);
					// Convert to 12:00 format
					var months = ['January','February','March','April','May','June','July','August','September','October','November','December'];
					var weekday=new Array(7);  //initialize weekday array for display later
					weekday[0]="Monday";
					weekday[1]="Tuesday";
					weekday[2]="Wednesday";
					weekday[3]="Thursday";
					weekday[4]="Friday";
					weekday[5]="Saturday";
					weekday[6]="Sunday";
					function addZero(i) {
				    	if (i < 10) {
					        i = "0" + i;
					    }
					    return i;
					}
					function pad(number, length){
					    var str = "" + number
					    while (str.length < length) {
					        str = '0'+str
					    }
					    return str
					}
					$(".timezone-convert-match-mobile,.timezone-convert-match-month,.timezone-convert-match-week,.timezone-convert-match-ampm,.timezone-convert-match-regular,.timezone-convert-match-h2h-neo,.timezone-convert-match-h2h").each(function(){
						var formatted_time = new Date(parseInt(this.dataset.time)*1000);
						var hours = formatted_time.getHours();
						var suffix = (hours >= 12)? 'pm' : 'am';
						var weekday_name = weekday[formatted_time.getDay()];
						weekday_name = weekday_name.substr(0,3);
						var month = formatted_time.getMonth();
						var month_name = months[formatted_time.getMonth()];
						var year = formatted_time.getFullYear();
						var day = formatted_time.getDate();
						//only -12 from hours if it is greater than 12 (if not back at mid night)
					    hours = (hours > 12)? hours -12 : hours;
					    //if 00 then it is 12 am
					    hours = (hours == '00')? 12 : hours;
					    var minutes = addZero(formatted_time.getMinutes());
					    if($(this).hasClass("timezone-convert-match-regular")){
					    	$(this).text(hours + ":" + minutes + suffix);
					    }
					    if($(this).hasClass("timezone-convert-match-mobile")){
					    	$(this).text(hours + ":" + minutes);
					    }
					    if($(this).hasClass("timezone-convert-match-ampm")){
					    	$(this).text(suffix);
					    }
					    if($(this).hasClass("timezone-convert-match-week")){
					    	$(this).text(weekday_name + " " + day + ", " + hours + ":" + minutes + suffix);
					    }
					    if($(this).hasClass("timezone-convert-match-month")){
					    	$(this).text(month_name + "/" + day + ", " + hours + ":" + minutes + suffix);
					    }
					    if($(this).hasClass("timezone-convert-match-h2h")){
					    	$(this).text(weekday_name + ", " + month_name + " " + day + year);
					    }
					    if($(this).hasClass("timezone-convert-match-h2h-neo")){
					    	$(this).text(month_name + " " + day + ", " + year + " - " + hours + ":" + minutes + suffix);
					    }
					});
	                // location.reload();
	            }
	        });	
		}

		var isMobile = false;
		
    });
</script>

                                        c.type = 'text/javascript';
                                        c.setAttribute('data-target', window.name);
                                        c.setAttribute('data-callback', 'put-your-callback-macro-here');

                                        try {
                                            a = parent.document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
                                        } catch (e) {
                                            a = !1;
                                        }

                                        a || (a = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]);
                                        a.parentNode.insertBefore(c, a);
                                    })(document, window);
                                </script>

</body><app-content ng-version="16.0.0"></app-content></html>
